name: Cybex: The Cosmic-War
overview: A horizontally scrolling shooter, specifically it is a colorful Armalyte clone originally released by Logo Software that was also published in Starlight Magazine #3. The game was created by Cyberstyle which included Musician: Rudolf Stember (Mr. Hostel burped), Graphician: Arnold Franz Sakowski (Swaziland Frank's rook) and Programmer: Ralph Kaspers (sharp sparkle).
